Understanding Users and Groups

The application allows you to add new groups and users manually.

The Server includes a user named "Administrator," with the case-sensitive password "Administrator." Since this fact is generally well known, it is recommended that you change this password as soon as you start to use the system.

Caution: Always create more than one user account with administrative privileges. If you log on with the only account that has administrative privileges, you have no way to unlock your own account if you become locked out.
